actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Natural Resources, and in addition to the Committee on Agriculture, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Natural Resources, and in addition to the Committee on Agriculture, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Conservation, Research, and Biotechnology.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Conservation, Research, and Biotechnology

official_title: To provide for the establishment of a National Interagency Seed and Restoration Center, and for other purposes.
short_title: National Interagency Seed and Restoration Center Establishment Act
